skills.name: Pierce Soul
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times to disturb the HP recovery for 2 turns with a 30% chance each. The damage increases according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +15%

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.5*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.1*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Soul Devourer
skills.description: Deals damage proportionate to your MAX HP to an enemy target and recovers 50% of the damage dealt as HP. The damage increases as the enemy's HP becomes lower.

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>*(-0.3*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Target's HP percentage in range 0 to 1, with 1 being full HP.">Target Current HP %</mark> + 0.7)

skills.name: Deadly Wrath
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a deadly wrath, dealing damage proportionate to your MAX HP, and Brands them for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Brand
skill_effect.description: Enemies with Branding Effect take 25% more Damage

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.4*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
